Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence that can significantly enhance your experience in [specific field or use]. Given its unique features and the value it provides, we're extending you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9500. This offer is tailored to recognize your potential for maximizing the full benefits of the product. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your [specific area] with our top-tier solution. If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to ask. We look forward to hearing from you soon! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
